citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15 am on
30-MAY-17.
Upon arrival family member stated licensee was gone for the day.
Additional Inspectors
Leisner Erika, Veterinary Medical Officer
